page_summary: This page provides guidance on the usage of controlled terminology and its relationship to other standards within the CDISC Therapeutic Area User Guide for Breast Cancer. It discusses the concept classification keys from the BRIDG model, the importance of using up-to-date controlled terminology from NCI EVS, and emphasizes that this guide does not replace foundational CDISC standards. The page is primarily narrative and does not introduce or define any specific clinical endpoints.
